description: This is a Dart source file defining a Flutter UI screen called 'ProcessingScreen' which manages and displays the progress of menu image processing, orchestrating stages like OCR, parsing, and image generation, and navigating to results upon completion.

classes.name: ProcessingArgs
classes.description: A class representing arguments passed to the ProcessingScreen, containing an image data URL.

classes.name: ProcessingScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays processing stages of menu image analysis and generation, including progress indicators, status updates, and navigation to results.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Initializes processing by retrieving navigation arguments and starting the orchestrator asynchronously after the first frame.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ProcessingScreen, including progress display, status indicators, and navigation logic.
